lines.text: Do you really want to escape?
Judging from the difference between the three of you, I'd say your mother was mighty busy!
He's a photographer from Sao Paulo. The two girls are models. They came down for a photo shoot. He says he works for a fashion magazine. If you ask me, I bet it's a sex one.
All right, bitch, this is it.

[to China]
You know what you are? You're a fat, smelly, evil bastard.

[to Kevin Hall]
You behave yourself. I may just put you to work in a mine. Otherwise I'll leave you tied up here for the pigs to eat,
